The Hot Tools CurlBar is ergonomically shaped in a 7-angle design to reduce stylist strain and features a customizable timer. Ideal for pros, this innovative curling iron creates long-lasting curls quickly and comfortably with precision control. The Remington Pro 1–1.5" Pearl Ceramic Curling Wand features a conical barrel with crushed pearl coating for smooth, shiny waves. With 9 heat settings, 410°F max, and auto shutoff, it’s great for quick, frizz-free, salon-style curls. The Sultra Bombshell 1.5" Clipless Curling Rod uses dual heaters and ThermaCore™ technology to create long-lasting curls with 395°F even heat, ideal for dry or color-treated hair. It curls in half the time of traditional irons and includes auto shutoff and a heat glove. The T3 SinglePass Curl 1.25" features a CeraGloss™ ceramic barrel and smart microchip with 5 heat settings for glossy, long-lasting curls. Designed for all hair lengths, it's ideal for glamorous styles with digital precision and smooth glide.
